meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a five-membered ring with four carbon atoms and one oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study furanes to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the furanes found in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The furanes in the beaker seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of furanes, each molecule a tiny universe.
meanings.sent5: The smell of furanes lingered in the air, hinting at the experiments conducted.

meanings.definition: Plural form of furan, a heterocyclic compound.
meanings.sent1: The researchers discussed the various uses of furanes in their presentation.
meanings.sent2: The store stocked different types of furanes for the customers.
meanings.sent3: As the furanes sat on the shelf, they whispered stories of their origins.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, furanes were the unsung heroes of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The students marveled at the beauty of furanes under the microscope.
